name: Honey Comb Tumblr Dashboard
description: This is a honey comb themed dashboard with unique dashboard controls and a compact tag area. Please see my other tumblr dashboard themes like Pink Lace. :) :) :)
additional_info: June 11, 2011: This is a recolor of Pink Lace. Please report any issues. I'm not using this one, so if there are problems, I won't know about it.
